question: What is a Cabinet Minister?
possible_answers: A. Candidate picked by the Prime Minister
B. MP picked by the Premier of each province
C. MP selected by the Prime Minister to run federal departments
D. MP selected by the King to make laws
answer: C. MP selected by the Prime Minister to run federal departments
explanatory_sentence: The Prime Minister chooses the ministers of the Crown, most of them from among members of the House of Commons. Cabinet ministers are responsible for running the federal government departments.
